description.brief: C++ implementation of the ROS package manager
description.p: rospack is a command-line program which provides many of the services of the *NIX pkg-config tool. It is used to find packages among the "forest" of code in a typical ROS distribution, calculate dependencies, mangle Makefiles, and in general promote peace and harmony in a ROS distribution.

rospack uses the TinyXML parser, a zLib-licensed library which is available here:
http://tinyxml.sourceforge.net
